page.title: 12Kirkby Precinct Library
page.content: On 14th May 1985 a group of 6 children from Kingsway Primary School visited Kirkby Library.They interviewed Mr. Mellor,one of three qualified librarians.He told them that the library was built between September and October 1966,and that it cost Â£52110 for furniture and fittings.As well as books,people can borrow tapes, records,maps,comics,magazines,newspape rs and lots more. The library has lots of staff including 3 librarians,1 senior assistant,2 full-time assistants, 6 part-time assistants,1 Saturday girl 1 caretaker,1 part-time cleaner and 1 mobile library driver. The fiction books in the library are organised in alphabetical order of authors.Non-fiction books are arranged according to the Dewey Decimal System.
